ti:work.ti:title: Animine an corporis affectiones sint peiores

ti:translation.ti:label: Whether the Affections of the Soul are Worse Than Those of the Body
ti:translation.ti:description: Plutarch. Moralia, Vol. VI. Helmbold, William Clark, translator. Cambridge, MA: Harvard University Press; London: William Heinemann Ltd., 1939 (printing).

ti:translation.ti:label: Whether the Passions of the Soul or Diseases of the Body Are Worse
ti:translation.ti:description: Plutarch. Plutarch's Morals, Vol. IV. Goodwin, William W., editor; White, Samuel, translator. Boston: Little, Brown, and Company; Cambridge: Press of John Wilson and Son, 1874.

ti:edition.ti:label: Ποτερον τὰ τῆς ψυχῆς ἢ τὰ τοῦ σώματος πάθη χείρονα
ti:edition.ti:description: Plutarch. Plutarchi Chaeronensis Moralia, Vol. IΙI. Vernardakēs, Grēgorios N., editor. Leipzig: Teubner, 1891.
